text: #DYK: Smithfield Foods family of brands includes products from your favorite #ham to delicious #hotdogs and #plantbased protein. Check out our full #brand portfolio:  https://www.smithfieldfoods.com/trusted-brands pic.twitter.com/kmxPjGwruh

Women at Smithfield have a wide variety of opportunities available to them and our EBRG, Women’s Connect recently visited Caddock Middle School’s career fair to share their stories with students. Our diverse stories and #career paths got the students excited about their #future!pic.twitter.com/8lqnxz65c4

It’s #NationalMeatballDay! Celebrate with our Carando brand of meatballs and give yourself a head-start on your homemade Italian meals. Try in the following flavors of these delicious #meatballs: Abruzzese Italian, Sicilian Italian, and Mozzarella Rustica.  https://jillcataldo.com/carando-meatballs/ …pic.twitter.com/o3O3rIn2tN
Happy #IWD2020! Thank you to all the #women at Smithfield Foods for furthering our mission to produce “Good food. Responsibly.®”pic.twitter.com/Bq8LnNad28

Every day, we are proud of our global #employees that comprise the Smithfield Family. From our headquarters in VA, to UT, SD, Poland & beyond, our people are essential. Your continued dedication & hard work allow us to produce “Good food. Responsibly. ®” #EmployeeAppreciationDaypic.twitter.com/o95wvSSxPQ

Looking to grow your career? As a global company, Smithfield Foods offers a variety of opportunities. From developing marketing campaigns to raising animals with care, you’ll have the chance to drive innovation. Learn more here:  https://www.smithfieldfoods.com/careers .https://youtu.be/6P3gv48_fEc

Really enjoyed my visit to Joe Baca Middle School in Bloomington, CA this morning. It’s always a privilege to get to talk to students and share my story. Best part was handing over a $10,000 check from @SmithfieldFoods. Can’t beat that! Onto @ACSupdates...

@SmithfieldBrandpic.twitter.com/MEe0RuyXIF

.@SmithfieldFoods announces an additional $45M investment in Monarch Bioenergy joint venture with @RoesleinAE on manure-to-#energy projects. The expansion will help Smithfield reduce #GHG emissions 25% by 2025: http://bit.ly/38ftzVv

#LeapYear is a fitting theme for 2020 as we look back on leaps forward we have made in our commitment #sustainability. We were the first major #protein company to announce a far-reaching greenhouse gas emission reduction goal. https://youtu.be/uTeHBnR6tk8

We recognize the value that veterans bring to our workforce and we are proud to serve them, as they have served us. Our Smithfield Salutes veterans Employee Business Resource Group aims to help them make a seamless transition to civilian life. Learn more:  https://www.smithfieldfoods.com/careers/veterans …pic.twitter.com/wK25Wh6L9T

#TBT: Earlier this month, we celebrated the #BigGame in Miami by helping our neighbors in need. Through our #HelpingHungryHomes initiative, we donated over 40K pounds of protein to @feedingsouthfl, located near @HardRockStadium. Read more in @NHF_Magazine. https://www.nationalhogfarmer.com/business/smithfield-kicks-2020-helping-hungry-homes-ahead-super-bowl …

We are proud to announce an additional $45M investment in our Monarch Bioenergy joint venture with @RoesleinAE on manure-to-#energy projects. The expansion will help us reduce our #GHG emissions 25% by 2025. More from @GlobalMeatNews. https://www.globalmeatnews.com/Article/2020/02/24/Smithfield-Foods-increases-investment-in-renewable-energy-scheme …

This #BlackHistoryMonth, we are celebrating Charles Henry Gray, a Smithfield Foods employee of 47 years who helped make Smithfield, VA the “Ham Capital of the World.” We continue to remember his legacy.pic.twitter.com/ca87a1FUTF

We proudly partnered with @GalloFamily for our 'Pairings with a Purpose' campaign! For each dual purchase of a #wine & our Marinated @smithfieldbrand Fresh #Pork resulting in over 30,000 lbs. of protein and $30,000 #donated.  https://www.smithfieldfoods.com/press-room/company-news/smithfield-foods-and-gallo-family-vineyards-join-forces-to-provide-over-30000-pounds-of-protein-and-30000-to-northwest-arkansas-food-bank …pic.twitter.com/v1viyyvHpq

Fighting food insecurity in communities throughout the country through programs like Hams Across America is key to our mission. Watch to learn more from @PorkCheckoff. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qq4JvETUbv4&feature=emb_title …
Learn more about our commitment to producing Good Food, Responsibly ®. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g5MwtxTVFxw …

Our #partnership with @dominionenergy is a natural fit that allows us to work together to accelerate our #sustainability goals. Read about our secret to a happy relationship from @GreenBiz. https://www.greenbiz.com/article/secret-happy-relationship-between-smithfield-foods-and-dominion-energy …

Chilly weather calls for a friendly Chili Cook-Off with our Smithfield Family! Last month, our Engineering, Finance, HR, Procurement & IT teams came together in Virginia for a friendly contest trying out the best chili. Look at those custom aprons!pic.twitter.com/sfFRMhkCMJ

Preparing for your #ValentinesDay date night meal but stuck on what dish to make? Carnado’s Mushroom and Sausage risotto:  https://carando.com/recipes/mushroom-and-sausage-risotto …pic.twitter.com/7Qliuq9Z08

Meet Lesley Garcia, a junior at the @UNLincoln and one of our Smithfield Foundation #scholarship recipients. Lesley is majoring in #psychology and is a research assistant for the Latinx Mental Health & Treatment Outcomes Lab. We're excited to see all that Lesley achieves!pic.twitter.com/7VvaXi64dl

We are thrilled to support @ShopFloorNam and @TheMfgInstitute to launch the #CreatorsWanted initiative by investing in our skilled manufacturing #workforce to drive the modern #manufacturing industry forward and reduce the skills gap. Learn more:  https://www.creatorswanted.org/creators-wanted-2020/ …pic.twitter.com/vqGusyvl7c

As a food company, science plays an important role in ensuring our products are safe. This #WomenInScience Day, we are celebrating our team including Janice Lors, Food Safety Quality Assurance Manager, who says #science has always played a role in her life!pic.twitter.com/3lKFVbdaw6
#DYK: Smithfield is the first company of its kind to commit to certifying 75% of its U.S. facilities as #ZeroWasteToLandfill by 2025. Learn more: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9RyP3DoAwZ4 …

#NationalPizzaDay is a holiday we can get behind. We are kicking off the celebration with delicious @SmithfieldBrand #Breakfast Pesto Pizzas with #Bacon, Ham and Sausage.  http://www.smithfield.com/meal-ideas/breakfastispowerfulstuff/breakfast-pesto-pizzas-with-bacon-ham-and-sausage/ …pic.twitter.com/GpnnMDBJxP

Today is #WearRedDay and our Lisle, Dension and Cudahy offices were proud to show their support! #GoRedForWomen brings awareness to the prevalence of heart and cardiovascular disease in women.pic.twitter.com/QRekMbh8T6

What are you prepping for dinner tonight? Did you know that fresh tenderloins and sirloins are lean sources of protein that taste good and are good for your heart?  Learn more from @AmericanHeart:  https://www.heart.org/en/healthy-living/healthy-eating/cooking-skills/preparing/making-the-healthy-cut-fish-poultry-and-lean-meats … #HeartMonth

Margherita Genoa Salami and Pepperoni #Snack Packs are perfect for wherever your day takes you to give you a boost of  and flavor!  https://www.margheritameats.com/recipe/snack-box … #onthego #snackingpic.twitter.com/gWUYCpPuNU

With #operations in 32 U.S. states and five countries around the world, Smithfield Foods offers flexible #employment opportunities for you and your family. Explore our map to learn more: https://www.smithfieldfoods.com/about-smithfield/our-operations …

We aren’t making any bets on the winner of Sunday’s #BigGame but these pigs in a blanket from @EckrichMeats are sure to be a touchdown with your game day guests!  https://eckrich.com/recipes/best-ever-pigs-in-a-blanket/ …pic.twitter.com/5x92cmG5iL
Today, @SmithfieldFoods donated over 30,000 pounds of protein, including a check for $33,334 to the @nwafoodbank. The contributions will help feed 120,000 servings.pic.twitter.com/DtENx0At1R

Emmanuel Adeniji, a senior majoring in mechanical engineering in @KState, is one of our Smithfield Foundation #scholarship recipients! He enjoys working with @Habitat_org and is active in on-campus programs. Learn more about our scholarship program:  https://www.smithfieldfoods.com/scholarships pic.twitter.com/uMWYqyztj2
We have developed an innovative approach to convert hog manure on our farms into renewable #energy. Discover the process:  https://www.smithfieldfoods.com/turning-manure-into-energy …

We are committed to the growth of our team members through continuous learning. At Smithfield Foods, we offer tuition assistance and training programs to advance our employees’ careers. Learn more:  http://www.smithfieldfoods.com/careers

Canyon View High School’s Sterling Scholar program provides students with the resources they need to grow. At Smithfield Foods, we are proud to support these efforts, making a contribution alongside @AmeriGas to the inspiring program in Utah.pic.twitter.com/orBGJNRss5

#TBT to 2019 when we hit a milestone and officially visited our 50th U.S. state as part of our Hungry Helping Homes food donation tour! #hungerrelief #foodsecurity #foodbankspic.twitter.com/2OP9OxnIG1

#DYK: At Smithfield Foods, we are committed to #sustainable operations. We’re reducing our greenhouse gas emissions 25% by 2025, which will shrink our carbon footprint and have the same impact as removing 900K cars from our roadways. https://www.smithfieldfoods.com/sustainability/report/2018/environment/smithfield-renewables …

Jeri Westra, long-time Smithfield Foods #employee w/ 35 yrs of service & recent retiree, was recognized last night by @SouthDakotaPork w/ the Friends of the Industry Award at the Master #Pork Producers Banquet. Congrats, Jeri & thank you for being part of our Smithfield Family! https://twitter.com/TriStateNeighbr/status/1217110397888712704 …

It's chilly outside which is perfect weather to cook up some @PureFarmland #plantbased #chili with your family. Enjoy this amazing recipe: https://pure-farmland.com/recipe/plant-based-protein-starter-chili/ …

We are teaming up with @DukeEnergy and @OptimaBio to transform wastewater into renewable natural gas and power over 2,000 homes and businesses in North Carolina using #renewable #energy. Learn more about the groundbreaking process:  https://www.smithfieldfoods.com/press-room/company-news/smithfield-foods-generates-renewable-natural-gas-from-wastewater-to-power-north-carolina-communities- …pic.twitter.com/WotRmca92E

Our @KretschmarDeli brand is making dreams come true with a $105,000 contribution to @makeawish!  https://www.globenewswire.com/news-release/2019/12/18/1962313/0/en/Kretschmar-Kicks-Off-2020-with-105-000-Donation-to-Make-A-Wish.html …pic.twitter.com/czw55A5uK7
#tbt: Hope everyone had a wonderful holiday season! We are still thinking about holiday ham! Who else enjoyed ham this holiday season?

Nothing says "thank you" better than a holiday ham and our employees in Missouri and Indiana thanked their #community businesses and public services by delivering hams over the holidays!pic.twitter.com/q3B5KrDx4K

May your holidays be filled with health, happiness…and #ham! As a Virginia-based company with operations in over 30 states, we’re proud that our food continues to be a part of your #holiday memories and family’s table for more than 80 years.  https://www.smithfieldfoods.com/about-smithfield …pic.twitter.com/rqoVPcMCYY
Without the thousands of #American family #farmers across the country, our delicious #holiday meals would not be possible, and what is a holiday without good food?pic.twitter.com/QBcZRDU3OV
Collaborating with @NextUpRVA, a recipient of one of our 2019 Impact Grants, we’re supporting students’ education and encouraging healthy lifestyles. #RVA https://youtu.be/BPQ_J3acxMA

Everyone deserves a holiday meal, and this season #SmithfieldFoods celebrates our charitable partners who help us make these meals possible for families in need. Together, we’ve provided more than 25 million servings of #food to our neighbors this year!  http://bit.ly/SmithfieldCharitableGiving …pic.twitter.com/3GH09bd0Zq

This #holiday season our employees are spreading holiday cheer throughout the communities we call home. Donations of toys, bicycles and holiday #hams were made possible by our employees and their dedication to making the season brighter for all.pic.twitter.com/8kxTE6MahL

#SeasonsGreetings to our Smithfield team members and retail partners who allow us to deliver on our promise of “Good food. Responsibly.®” We raise a glass (and fork) to you and the people who enjoy our products every day!  http://bit.ly/SmithfieldHoliday …pic.twitter.com/Whp1L3dPei

Through our #HelpingHungryHomes program, we are proud to continue supporting families in need this holiday season with #protein donations to @FeedingAmerica so families like Ashley and Martin can put food on the table.pic.twitter.com/SLabW4q8pr

On October 12th, Smithfield Hog Production Central rolled up their sleeves for a BBQ cook-off at the Annual Court Square Street fair, all proceeds from the delicious dishes went to the @UnitedWay. We took home 2nd and are gearing up to bring home the gold next year!pic.twitter.com/vgoygZHvXx
